name: Who Let The Drones Out!?
description:
Who let the drones out!? is a real time puzzle game where you have to round up your beloved bots gone bad. You take the role as professor Jar J. Brains during a chaotic night in his laboratory. When your best drones starts heading for the exit you are left with no choice but to make a roll for it! After all your lab is a bit of a mess what with all the lasers and stuff still on...

Now... make your way to shut down the main generator to save the lifes of your precious drones.
